name: RPS Smash
description:
RPS SMASH! is as 2D pixel art battle arena game inspired by Super Smash Bros. This game is a part of the submission for the Weekly Game Jam 154. The theme of the game jam was ‘Rock, Paper and Scissors’ We are a team of three, one programmer, sound designer and an artist, with each of us contributing our core strengths to this game project. All assets are created by each individual.
Synopsis:
Prepare to fight in the annual arena fights between the three primary tribes of Rock, Paper and Scissors. Select your champion and prepare to fight to victory to become the one ruling tribe!
Controls:

P1:

Movement: WASD
Basic Attack: Q
Special Attack: E

P2:

Movement: Arrow keys
Basic Attack: Period
Special Attack: Slash
